channel.title: [508] fearny pks [508] AMAZING
channel.description:
Here is a palidino76 based server edited by me. I added HD and LD support, shops, trading, and private messaging
INFO:
I downloaded pali's version 3.1 and then added trading, hd ld, friends list, then i thought... hmmm why not release a half decent base. So I started to get everything ready. I then noticed... theres no shops! so I added those. so I took pictures from what has been done then i noticed, wow looks like to little info, so I used some of palis pics. Of course I did not do most of this as im not as good as graham and gravediggah :) but I thought it was time that people started leeching a good base.... not stuff like bulby's. The server is weak right now as there are no noncombat skills or combat. Expect updates semi regularly (as in, i get on the computer where i can test regularly), but dont count on them daily or anything of the sort.
his pics:

[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=DDEPQ025]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=DDEPQ025[/url] [B]508 Server v1:[/B] [url=http://uppit.com/D27EAT]http://uppit.com/D27EAT[/url] [url=http://www.2shared.com/file/3811116/82351741/Palidino76s_508_Server.html]http://www.2shared.com/file/3811116/82351741/Palidino76s_508_Server.html[/url] [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/139551773/Palidino76s_508_Server.zip.html]http://rapidshare.com/files/139551773/Palidino76s_508_Server.zip.html[/url] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=CEBCR502]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=CEBCR502[/url]
[B]v4.0:[/B] ~ more advanced bank (search option does work) ~ friends list/ignore list working - graham ~ shops - about 10 people from rs ~ trading - 2 people from rs (Martin and Gravediggah) [B]v3.1:[/B] ~ Basic banking added (::bank). ~ Full chat added. ~ Extremely basic pvp added. ~ Steams buffer expanding bug fixed. [B]v3.0.3 log:[/B] ~ Login speed is much faster now without removing why it originally took longer. ~ Multiple crash bugs fixed. ~ 20+ more mapdata files. [B]v3.0.2 log:[/B] ~ Login now takes about 15 seconds, now while they made sound retarded it allows connections from a much larger distance to where your hosting the server to connect, without this added a good number of people will be blocked out of the server because of timing out because it takes to long for them to respond. [B]v3.0.1 log:[/B] ~ Fixed the final account saving bug. [B]v3 log:[/B] ~ File loading saving bug fixed. ~ More map data included. ~ Allows spaces in usernames. [B]v2 log:[/B] ~ Fixed hit update masks, the ratio should be * 255 rather than * 30. ~ In the destruct method in the palidino76.rs2.players.Player class, the players coords should be set to -1 to remove them from other players screens when they log out.
The reason I'm suggesting to make the switch is because this 508 server is so much more stable then rs2e.
Cache: I can upload the cache although it'll take awhile, but just login to rs2 for say 10 minutes, and then go to C:/Windows/.Jagex_cache_32/runescape and copy the contents to c:/cache508/rs2/
[B]508 Cache:[/B] [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/139573589/rs2_folder.zip.html]http://rapidshare.com/files/139573589/rs2_folder.zip.html[/url]
[B]Other 508 Mapdata:[/B] [URL=http://"http://www.megaupload.com/?d=XCV6MRJS"]Grand exchange - credits to Pixel[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.megaupload.com/?d=N72V8IZL"]Multiple areas - credits to ROYALE.[/URL]
[B]Coords:[/B] [U]Credits to ROYALE.:[/U] 3184 9832 - under varrock bank 3236 9767 - varrock sewers 3096 9880 - under edgeville 3104 9576 - under wizards tower 3080 9664 - draynor sewers 3208 9616 - under lumbridge 3224 9800 - under varrock blue moon pub 3240 9776 - black arms gang hideout 1680 5592 - fist of guthix first part
[B][U][SIZE="3"]Q & A[/SIZE][/U][/B] [U]Question 1[/U] Q: The client stops loading at the update server. A: You need to have the server running first. [U]Question 2[/U] Q: I get the error, "error: Signlink:233 Signlink:372 Applet_sub1:388 client:2194 : java.lang.RuntimeException." A: Download and place the cache in the right place.
credits:
gravediggah martin palidino76 me other people

item.title: [508] fearny pks [508] AMAZING
item.dc:creator: @Gods_army Gods army
item.description:
@Gods_army wrote:

Here is a palidino76 based server edited by me. I added HD and LD support, shops, trading, and private messaging

INFO:

I downloaded pali’s version 3.1 and then added trading, hd ld, friends list, then i thought… hmmm why not release a half decent base. So I started to get everything ready. I then noticed… theres no shops! so I added those. so I took pictures from what has been done then i noticed, wow looks like to little info, so I used some of palis pics. Of course I did not do most of this as im not as good as graham and gravediggah but I thought it was time that people started leeching a good base… not stuff like bulby’s. The server is weak right now as there are no noncombat skills or combat. Expect updates semi regularly (as in, i get on the computer where i can test regularly), but dont count on them daily or anything of the sort.

his pics:


(Thanks to Danno for the ids)

My pics:

HD & LD comparison.

Friends list

Shops

Trading

http://www.2shared.com/file/3821880/f2e54862/Palidino76s_508_Server.html
http://rapidshare.com/files/140062345/Palidino76s_508_Server.zip.html
508 Server v3.0.2:
http://www.2shared.com/file/3813249/c7b28847/Palidino76s_508_Server.html
http://rapidshare.com/files/139668613/Palidino76s_508_Server.zip.html
508 Server v3.0.1:
http://www.2shared.com/file/3813123/737b7886/Palidino76s_508_Server.html
http://rapidshare.com/files/139661468/Palidino76s_508_Server.zip.html
508 Server v2:
http://www.2shared.com/file/3811857/9e8fd95c/Palidino76s_508_Server.html
http://rapidshare.com/files/139592870/Palidino76s_508_Server.zip.html
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=DDEPQ025
508 Server v1:
http://uppit.com/D27EAT
http://www.2shared.com/file/3811116/82351741/Palidino76s_508_Server.html
http://rapidshare.com/files/139551773/Palidino76s_508_Server.zip.html
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=CEBCR502

v4.0:
~ more advanced bank (search option does work)
~ friends list/ignore list working - graham
~ shops - about 10 people from rs
~ trading - 2 people from rs (Martin and Gravediggah)
v3.1:
~ Basic banking added (::bank).
~ Full chat added.
~ Extremely basic pvp added.
~ Steams buffer expanding bug fixed.
v3.0.3 log:
~ Login speed is much faster now without removing why it originally took longer.
~ Multiple crash bugs fixed.
~ 20+ more mapdata files.
v3.0.2 log:
~ Login now takes about 15 seconds, now while they made sound retarded it allows connections from a much larger distance to where your hosting the server to connect, without this added a good number of people will be blocked out of the server because of timing out because it takes to long for them to respond.
v3.0.1 log:
~ Fixed the final account saving bug.
v3 log:
~ File loading saving bug fixed.
~ More map data included.
~ Allows spaces in usernames.
v2 log:
~ Fixed hit update masks, the ratio should be * 255 rather than * 30.
~ In the destruct method in the palidino76.rs2.players.Player class, the players coords should be set to -1 to remove them from other players screens when they log out.

The reason I’m suggesting to make the switch is because this 508 server is so much more stable then rs2e.

Cache: I can upload the cache although it’ll take awhile, but just login to rs2 for say 10 minutes, and then go to C:/Windows/.Jagex_cache_32/runescape and copy the contents to c:/cache508/rs2/

508 Cache:
http://rapidshare.com/files/139573589/rs2_folder.zip.html

Other 508 Mapdata:
Grand exchange - credits to Pixel
Multiple areas - credits to ROYALE.

Coords:

3184 9832 - under varrock bank
3236 9767 - varrock sewers
3096 9880 - under edgeville
3104 9576 - under wizards tower
3080 9664 - draynor sewers
3208 9616 - under lumbridge
3224 9800 - under varrock blue moon pub
3240 9776 - black arms gang hideout
1680 5592 - fist of guthix first part

[SIZE=“3”]Q & A[/SIZE]
Question 1
Q: The client stops loading at the update server.
A: You need to have the server running first.
Question 2
Q: I get the error, “error: Signlink:233 Signlink:372 Applet_sub1:388 client:2194 : java.lang.RuntimeException.”
A: Download and place the cache in the right place.
